name: CreateRecordingRule

post.description: 该接口用于给Prometheus实例创建预聚合规则。

parameters.description: 租户从IAM申请到的projectid,一般为32位字符串。
parameters.name: project_id

application/json.error_msg: recording rule exist for the prometheus instance

post.summary: 创建Prometheus实例的预聚合规则

x-request-examples-1.recording_rule:
groups:
    - name: apiserver_request_total
      interval: 60s
      rules:
        - record: job_instance_mode:apiserver_request_total:avg_rate5m
          expr: avg by (job, instance, mode) (rate(apiserver_request_total[5m]))
          labels:
            team: operations
        - record: job:apiserver_request_total:sum_rate10m
          expr: sum by (job)(rate(apiserver_request_total[10m]))
          labels:
            team: operations

post.x-request-examples-description-1: 给Prometheus实例创建预聚合规则。

x-request-examples-text-1.recording_rule:
groups:
    - name: apiserver_request_total
      interval: 60s
      rules:
        - record: job_instance_mode:apiserver_request_total:avg_rate5m
          expr: avg by (job, instance, mode) (rate(apiserver_request_total[5m]))
          labels:
            team: operations
        - record: job:apiserver_request_total:sum_rate10m
          expr: sum by (job)(rate(apiserver_request_total[10m]))
          labels:
            team: operations

summary: 创建Prometheus实例的预聚合规则
